roleset.name: to forge or misrepresent
roleset.note: FALSIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'falsify' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from falsify.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Tony was four years older than most of his fellow cadets , and gained admission to the academy because his brother had falsified his birth certificate .
